front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) - Networking Services - Corrigendum 1: Corrections to Annex G Packet format examples

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This corrigendum corrects three errors in IEEE Std 1609.3-2010 related to Gateway MAC Address, EDCA Parameter Set, and 3DLocationAndConfidence fields.
